channel.title: vektr.news
channel.description: AI-curated cryptocurrency news and analysis from trusted sources across the web. Stay updated with Bitcoin, Ethereum, DeFi, and the latest crypto market trends.

item.title: Coinbase CEO Drops Major Solana News as Key Integration Goes Live
item.description: The integration of Solana on Coinbase could revolutionize the crypto landscape with its advanced blockchain technology.
item.author: curator@vektr.news (vektr)

item.title: Galaxy Digital to tokenize its SEC-registered shares on Solana in key RWA move
item.description: Superstate introduced Opening Bell in May to trade SEC-registered stocks on Solana's blockchain, revolutionizing traditional markets.
item.author: curator@vektr.news (vektr)

item.title: Galaxy Digital Tokenizes Its Shares on Solana With Superstate
item.description: Firm's common stock can now be traded as SEC tokens on Superstate's Opening Bell platform, offering new opportunities for investors.
item.author: curator@vektr.news (vektr)
